questions.question: Is there a danger in thinking Adolf Hitler was probably pretty confident that he led a group of good guys?
Like what, literally what else could they do at that point, you know, to rescue all these Jews?
What did you know about children being taught at school to turn in their parents for having some extra bread?
How did it get to that point that they're just shooting children and everyone's cheering for this?
Now who are you, who are any of us to tell him not to make that joke?
Another way to say it is how do you be funny and yet thoughtful on Twitter?
How many places do we have evidence of that you can have at a large scale?
One that you find impactful, insightful, useful for us in modern society that you think about?
What does it mean for the United States in some way for different states to succeed?
Is there something that emerges to you as a set of ideas that are like, what do you call that?
What do you think about psychedelics in terms of the kind of places that can take your mind?
